titleApp: Math solver - Speed, distance and time
tooltipButtonVelocity: Click to calculate the vehicle speed
tooltipButtonDistance: Click to calculate the road length
tooltipButtonTime: Click to calculate the vehicle driving time
tooltipCalculatedValue: The value in the {field} field will be calculated.
tooltipChooseDirection: Choose the direction of the {vehicle} vehicle.
infoSimpleCalculator: The average velocity calculator computes speed, distance, and time based on the provided values. Enter two of the three values, and the calculator will determine the missing one. It also allows unit conversion (e.g., km/h to m/s).
infoAdvancedCalculator: The train calculator computes the speed, distance, and meeting time of two trains. Enter the speeds of both trains and the distance between them, and the calculator will determine the meeting time and the distances of the trains from the cities. The results will be displayed in the graphic below.
velocityUnitError: Velocity unit must be a number
distanceUnitError: Distance unit must be a number
timeUnitError: Time unit must be a number
velocityUnitMin: Velocity unit must be greater than 0
distanceUnitMin: Distance unit must be greater than 0
velocityUnitMax: Velocity unit must be less than 1000
distanceUnitMax: Distance unit must be less than 1000
timeUnitMax: Time unit must be less than 1000
velocityUnitKmHMin: Velocity unit must be greater than 0
velocityUnitMphMin: Velocity unit must be greater than 0
distanceUnitKmMin: Distance unit must be greater than 0
distanceUnitMMin: Distance unit must be greater than 0

value.max: Value must be a number less than or equal to {max}.
value.nonNegativeNumber: Value must be a number equal to or more than 0.
value.positiveNumber: Value must be a number more than 0.
